title: Bayer CropScience 's revenue 2005 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenues in million euros has increased over the Year.

Revenues in million euros is roughly constant from 2005 to 2007, roughly increasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Revenues in million euros, about 10367.0 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Revenues in million euros about 5700.0 was reached at Year 2006
min_summary: In general Revenues in million euros has rose over the Year.
